DOC.brief_title: Transpulmonary Pressures in Mechanical Ventilated Patients With Morbid Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: We are studying adult patients with morbid obesity with respiratory failure requiring mechanical ventilation. We are measuring transesophageal presssures to estimate ideal PEEP and evaluate hemodynamic parameters.
